text: Luigi Di Pasquale (born June 12, 1919 in Udine) was an Italian professional football player. He played for 3 seasons (17 games, 3 goals) in the Serie A for A.S. Roma. ==Honours== * Serie A champion: 1941/42. ==External links== Category:1919 births Category:Year of death missing Category:Italian footballers Category:Serie A players Category:Udinese Calcio players Category:A.S. Roma players Category:Calcio Padova players Category:A.C. Cesena players Category:Association football forwards
title: Luigi Di Pasquale (footballer, born 1919)
